roleset.name: to give a title to
roleset.note: TITLE-V NOTES: Comparison with 'name' and 'entitle'. No Vncls. (from title.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: In [a July analysis]-1 titled [*]-1 `` From Euphoria to Despair , '' W.I. Carr ( Far East ) Ltd. , another securities firm , said that eroding confidence might undermine future economic development .

example.name: transitive
example.text: After four year of tinkering and $ 2.4 million [*U*] in seed money , the board set up the new marketplace , titled it the Chicago Board Options Exchange , and named Sullivan its first president .
example.arg: After four year of tinkering and $ 2.4 million [*U*] in seed money
